template.template: Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22
template.name: Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22
template.description: https://github.com/AndAndr Автообнаружение интерфейсов для коммутаторов Eltex серии MES.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Inbound packets discarded
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of inbound packets which were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. One possible reason for discarding such a packet could be to free up buffer space. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Inbound packets with errors
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of inbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of inbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Bits received
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of octets received on the interface, including framing characters. This object is a 64-bit version of ifInOctets. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Outbound packets discarded
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The number of outbound packets which were chosen to be discarded even though no errors had been detected to prevent their being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. One possible reason for discarding such a packet could be to free up buffer space. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Outbound packets with errors
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB For packet-oriented interfaces, the number of outbound packets that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. For character-oriented or fixed-length interfaces, the number of outbound transmission units that contained errors preventing them from being deliverable to a higher-layer protocol. Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Bits sent
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The total number of octets transmitted out of the interface, including framing characters. This object is a 64-bit version of ifOutOctets.Discontinuities in the value of this counter can occur at re-initialization of the management system, and at other times as indicated by the value of ifCounterDiscontinuityTime.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Speed
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB An estimate of the interface's current bandwidth in units of 1,000,000 bits per second. If this object reports a value of `n' then the speed of the interface is somewhere in the range of `n-500,000' to`n+499,999'. For interfaces which do not vary in bandwidth or for those where no accurate estimation can be made, this object should contain the nominal bandwidth. For a sub-layer which has no concept of bandwidth, this object should be zero.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Operational status
item_prototype.description: MIB: IF-MIB The current operational state of the interface. - The testing(3) state indicates that no operational packet scan be passed - If ifAdminStatus is down(2) then ifOperStatus should be down(2) - If ifAdminStatus is changed to up(1) then ifOperStatus should change to up(1) if the interface is ready to transmit and receive network traffic - It should change todormant(5) if the interface is waiting for external actions (such as a serial line waiting for an incoming connection) - It should remain in the down(2) state if and only if there is a fault that prevents it from going to the up(1) state - It should remain in the notPresent(6) state if the interface has missing(typically, hardware) components.

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
trigger_prototype.description: Триггер работает следующим образом: 1. Стреляет, если "Operation status" интерфейса уходит в состояние "Down(0)". 2. Вы можете определять на уровне шаблона или создать на хосте макрос { $IFCONTROL }=1 - для глобального определения всех интерфейсов важными или { $IFCONTROL }=0 - не важными. (Убрать пробелы!) 3. Вы можете использовать на хосте макросы с контекстом для определения конкретного интерфейса важным или не важным, в зависимости от Вашего решения в п.2, например: { $IFCONTROL:{#IFNAME} }=1. (Убрать пробелы!) 4. Стреляет, если "Operation status" интерфейса до этого был в состоянии "Up(1)" 5. Триггер можно закрыть вручную, стрелять при следующем опросе он не будет потому, что п.4.

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} or {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>0
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} and {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High bandwidth usage ( > {$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}% )
trigger_prototype.description: The network interface utilization is close to its estimated maximum bandwidth.

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].min(5m)}>{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} or {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].min(5m)}>{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].max(5m)}<{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}*0.8 and {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].max(5m)}<{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}*0.8
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High error rate ( > {$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} for 5m)

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

For a sub-layer which has no concept of bandwidth, this object should be zero.

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:lag.net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:lag.net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} or {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:lag.net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:lag.net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:lag.net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>0

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): SFP Input power
item_prototype.description: Input power on SFP interface.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): SFP mA
item_prototype.description: mA on SFP interface.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): SFP Out power
item_prototype.description: Out power on SFP interface.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): SFP temperature
item_prototype.description: Temperature on SFP interface.

item_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): SFP Volt
item_prototype.description: Volt on SFP interface.

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} or {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}>({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}/100)*{Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}) and {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}>0
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.in[ifHCInOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()} and {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.out[ifHCOutOctets.{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(15m)}<(({$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}-3)/100)*{Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.speed[ifHighSpeed.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High bandwidth usage ( > {$IF.UTIL.MAX:"{#IFNAME}"}% )
trigger_prototype.description: The network interface utilization is close to its estimated maximum bandwidth.

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].min(5m)}>{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} or {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].min(5m)}>{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.in.errors[ifInErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].max(5m)}<{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}*0.8 and {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.out.errors[ifOutErrors.{#SNMPINDEX}].max(5m)}<{$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"}*0.8
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): High error rate ( > {$IF.ERRORS.WARN:"{#IFNAME}"} for 5m)

dependency.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Link down
dependency.expression: {$IFCONTROL:"{#IFNAME}"}=1 and ({Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].last()}=2 and {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.net.if.status[ifOperStatus.{#SNMPINDEX}].diff()}=1)

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.rlPhyTestGetResult.InPow[{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}<({Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22:optic.rlPhyTestGetResult.OutPow[{#SNMPINDEX}].avg(5m)}*{$SFP.INOUTPOW.RATIO})
trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Затухание на SFP
trigger_prototype.description: Потери мощности на оптической линии. Для корректировки чувствительности смотри макрос { $SFP.INOUTPOW.RATIO }

macro.description: Во сколько раз различаются InPow и OutPow. Увеличить коэффициент - загрубить триггер.

resource.name: Copper Interface {#IFNAME}({#IFALIAS}): Network traffic
resource.host: Template Module Eltex MES Interfaces SNMPv22
